testCase.name: Enhanced MCard Client Error Handling should throw ValidationError for empty content
Enhanced MCard Client Error Handling should throw ValidationError for extremely long content
Enhanced MCard Client Error Handling should throw NotFoundError for non-existent card
Enhanced MCard Client Error Handling should throw AuthorizationError for invalid API key
Enhanced MCard Client Error Handling should throw NetworkError for network connectivity issues
Enhanced MCard Client Error Handling should handle unexpected server errors
Enhanced MCard Client Content Validation should validate content length
Enhanced MCard Client Content Validation should allow custom content validators
Enhanced MCard Client Content Validation should validate content with special characters
Enhanced MCard Client Metrics Tracking should track successful requests
Enhanced MCard Client Metrics Tracking should track failed requests
Enhanced MCard Client Metrics Tracking should track multiple requests
Enhanced MCard Client Metrics Tracking should reset metrics
Enhanced MCard Client Logging should log debug information when debug is enabled
Enhanced MCard Client Logging should not log debug information when debug is disabled
Enhanced MCard Client Client Configuration should allow custom base URL
Enhanced MCard Client Client Configuration should use default configuration when no options provided
Enhanced MCard Client Client Configuration should allow custom timeout configuration
Enhanced MCard Client Card Operations should create a card successfully
Enhanced MCard Client Card Operations should get a card successfully
Enhanced MCard Client Card Operations should delete a card successfully
Enhanced MCard Client Card Operations should create a card with metadata
